long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OPT Helper is an essential tool for international students navigating the Optional Practical Training (OPT) process. This extension provides:

📅 Deadline Tracking: Stay on top of important OPT dates with timely reminders.

📄 Document Checklist: Keep your application organized and ensure you have all 
the required documents.

💼 Employment Monitoring: Track your OPT employment duration and avoid exceeding unemployment limits.

🔍 E-Verify Status Checker: Quickly check if potential employers are E-Verified to ensure compliance.

📚 Quick Access to Resources: Get the latest USCIS updates and OPT-related resources at your fingertips.


Simplify your OPT journey with reminders, checklists, and up-to-date information—all in one convenient Chrome extension! 🚀
